title: Commonwealth Review. No. 09
brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Modernization of Pakistan’s fishing industry; Young people trek through the Rocky Mountains of Canada on horseback; Fire officers from Trinidad and Tobago watch British fire recruits training and the latest British fire-fighting equipment demonstrated; The pyretheum industry in Kenya; The opening of Television Malaysia; The opening to the public of President N’Kruma’s private zoo in Ghana.
